name: Truth or Dare - DIRTY Edition
description:
Get the party started with the most advanced Truth or Dare app.

Features
● Play the most original truth or dare challenges
● Enjoy secret privileges, only app owners can have
● Add your own truth or dare challenges - make it personal, or dirty as you like
● Hustle free gaming experience with the 'Virtual Circle' mode
● We have 5 challenging truth or dare categories to choose from
● Control the game from your Apple Watch
● Free iCloud sync for your progress & purchases
● Play clean as it can be..
● Or play it HARD and find out how brave you really are
● Let our advanced Text-to-Speech engine read the truth or dare cards for you
● Customize the game with cool backgrounds, and bottles
● Keep a sweet memory by recording the tasks, and share them with friends
● Browse our gallery, and like or comment on other people truth or dare videos and photos

With Truth or Dare you can:
- Have an unforgettable party with your friends
- Play in a slumber party, birthday or any other social meeting
- Spin the bottle, or shake the device to get a task
- Play for hours without getting bored! never get the same question or dare.
- Get popular and break the ice with instant laughs, and fun moments
- Play on your iPhone or iPad, in a group, or just couples
- Be the star of party! have fun at Valentine's Day, Christmas, or New Year's Eve

--- CONTACT US ---
Questions? Ideas? We are here for you!
tomerubin@gmail.com
